sentences.en: ...a large courtyard full of builders' paraphernalia.
sentences.cn: …一个充满建筑装备的大院子

sentences.en: All my fishing paraphernalia is in the car.
Along with gloves, goggles and other paraphernalia , the new gear set her back about $ 700.
sentences.cn: 包括手套 、 雪镜,和其他随身用具, 整套装备花了她700美元.

sentences.en: an electric kettle and all the paraphernalia for making tea and coffee
sentences.cn: 电水壶及沏茶冲咖啡的全套用具

sentences.en: And before treatment patients purchase and paraphernalia: needles, tubes, and tape.
sentences.cn: 患者在接受治疗前不仅要支付治疗费用还要购买各种治疗用具: 针 、 针管和胶布.

sentences.en: B: I know. He has all the music paraphernalia you can buy.
sentences.cn: 我知道. 你能买到的音乐相关产品,他全都有.

sentences.en: Can you move all your paraphernalia out of the way?
sentences.cn: 你可以把所有的随身物品移开 吗 ?

sentences.en: Get rid of all cigarettes and ashtrays and other paraphernalia associated with smoking.
sentences.cn: 扔掉所有香烟、烟灰缸和与吸烟有关的其他物品。

sentences.en: Have you ever seen him with any drug paraphernalia?
sentences.cn: 你看过他带着任何与违禁品有关的东西 吗 ?

sentences.en: He has all the music paraphernalia you can buy.
sentences.cn: 你能买到的音乐相关产品,他全都有.

sentences.en: Skip the art museum, and head to the halls filled with quirky and fun paraphernalia.
sentences.cn: 别去美术馆, 去那些收纳有趣和古怪随身品的博物馆吧.

sentences.en: The whole paraphernalia of contemporary neoclassical economics seems to have become suddenly obsolete.
sentences.cn: 当代新古典经济学的全部工具似乎突然变得过时了.

sentences.en: Theatrical paraphernalia had been provided over and above her care.
sentences.cn: 演戏用的行头是主办单位提供的,不用她操心.

sentences.en: Therefore the camouflage paraphernalia appears, more or less visible, to your own astonishment.
sentences.cn: 因此,会显现随身携带的伪装, 或多或少能被你们看到, 这令你们吃惊.

sentences.en: Under Texas law , however, unofficial NEP syringes are drug paraphernalia.
sentences.cn: 但按德州的法律, 非官方的NEP注射器是随身的毒品工具.

sentences.en: Visitors can shop there and buy paraphernalia such as Microsoft shirts and cups.
sentences.cn: 游客可在那里买到如微软衬衫及杯子之类的相关用品.

words.tran_cn: 随身用具；全部有关的事物；设备

trans.tran_cn: 随身物品，装备，设备，[法]妻子的财产
trans.tran_en: You can refer to a large number of objects that someone has with them or that are connected with a particular activity as paraphernalia
